biotools.summary: This tutorial aims to illustrate how to compute a fast-growth mutation free energy calculation, step by step, using the BioExcel Building Blocks library (biobb). The particular example used is the Staphylococcal nuclease protein (PDB code 1STN), a small, minimal protein, appropriate for a short tutorial.

bioschemas.name: BioExcel Building Blocks tutorials: Mutation Free Energy Calculations
